6.3.6 Siruseri

Figure 6.11: Siruseri in 2002
Source: (Jayaraman, 2015)
The area where IT industries have been developed in SIPCOT, Siruseri, is the
converging point for flood waters from two drainage systems entering the Kovalam
creek. This region of SIPCOT was underwater and inaccessible during the 2015
floods.
